titles.title: Honor America's Guard-Reserve Retirees Act
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to recognize the service in the reserve components of certain persons by honoring them with status as veterans under law.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Honor America's Guard-Reserve Retirees Act - Honors as a veteran any person entitled to retired pay for nonregular (reserve) service or, but for age, would be so entitled. Provides that such person shall not be entitled to any benefit solely by reason of such recognition.
